interface.description: Interface for identity information of ZWave libraries used in the device.

field.name: ZWave, Library Type
field.description: A number identifying the Library Type used.

field.name: ZWave, Protocol Version
field.description: Version number (version.subvesion) of the ZWave protocol used.

field.name: ZWave, Application Version
field.description: Version number (version.subvesion) of the ZWave application used.
